Advanced Typechecking for Stack-Based Languages

February 17, 2024

It's been a while since I posted anything, because I've been hard at work on SaberVM's implementation and a little lambda calculus compiler that targets SaberVM. I thought I should take the time to discuss one of the interesting aspects of my implementation, a performant typechecker for SaberVM's type system.
